Methods

names

  • names(df: DataFrame, itemSize: number, serie: Serie<IArray>, name: string): string[]

  • Get the potential names decomposition

    see

    todo

    Parameters

    • df: DataFrame

      The dataframe supporting the series

    • itemSize: number

      The itemSize (1 for scalar, 3 for vectors...)

    • serie: Serie<IArray>

      The current serie involved

    • name: string

      The name of the serie (refact: the same name of the serie? Check!!!)

    Returns string[]

serie

  • serie(df: DataFrame, itemSize: number, name: string): Serie<IArray>

  • Get the serie decomposed (or not)

    Parameters

    • df: DataFrame

      The dataframe

    • itemSize: number

      The itemSize of the serie that we want

    • name: string

      The querying name

    Returns Serie<IArray>
